name: Catan
description: A resource-trading game where players settle and develop the island of Catan.

name: Ticket to Ride
description: A railway-themed game where players build train routes across maps.

name: Pandemic
description: Players work together to stop the outbreak of diseases around the world.

name: Carcassonne
description: Players build a medieval landscape by placing tiles and claiming features.

name: Terraforming Mars
description: Players compete to transform Mars into a habitable planet.

name: Wingspan
description: A bird-themed game where players attract birds to their wildlife preserves.

name: 7 Wonders
description: Players build ancient civilisations through drafting cards and managing resources.

name: Gloomhaven
description: A campaign-driven cooperative dungeon-crawling game with evolving storylines.

name: Splendor
description: A resource collection game where players acquire gems to develop cards.

name: Dominion
description: Players compete to build the most effective deck of cards.

name: Azul
description: Players draft tiles to decorate a Portuguese palace.

name: Scythe
description: An alternate-history game of farming, combat, and resource control.

name: Codenames
description: Players give clues to guess words on a board while avoiding others.

name: Betrayal at House on the Hill
description: A cooperative exploration game with a twist where one player becomes a traitor.

name: Risk
description: Players compete to conquer territories on a world map.

name: The Resistance
description: A game of deception where players are rebels or spies completing missions.

name: King of Tokyo
description: Players take on the role of monsters battling to become King of Tokyo.

name: Patchwork
description: A two-player game where players build a quilt with tiles.

name: Tokaido
description: Players travel along Japanâ€™s Tokaido road collecting experiences.

name: Agricola
description: Players build and develop their own farms.

name: Everdell
description: A woodland-themed game where players develop their own forest city.

name: Root
description: Players control factions vying for control of a woodland area.

name: Clue
description: A murder mystery game where players solve the case through deduction.

name: Mysterium
description: Players work together to solve a murder using psychic clues.

name: Love Letter
description: A quick card game about delivering a love letter to the princess.
